attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Retract the decision made by Chief of the General Staff to allow Prince Harry to go to Iraq, because this will endanger the lives or our men and women serving their Country in that war zone. It is well publicised that his presence will cause an increase in attacks on our soldiers - so stop this lunacy now!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
